entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.9°C

Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow or rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
